__e: I had my doubts about Count Olaf, but now that I see he's putting three young children in the theater, all my anxieties are put to rest.
We were afraid to give ourselves allergic reactions, we were afraid to steal a sailboat, and we were afraid to make our way across Lake Lachrymose in the middle of a hurricane.
You children have had such sorrow in your lives already, you deserve the blessing of a new family with Count Olaf, and, if you don't mind my saying so... with me.
as well as in God Almighty, for the successful outcome of this matter.
If you care for me at all, Count Odo, you will bring me his head.
Count Odo, I am determined not to quit the city.
